parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post refers to Ovidiu Bistrian, but not in the context of a parliamentary election.  The post focuses on his actions as a County Councilor, advocating for specific projects in Caraș-Severin County. There is no mention of any parliamentary candidacy or affiliation.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The content discusses public projects and initiatives, not private matters.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to inform the public about Ovidiu Bistrian's activities as a County Councilor and his support for various projects. While this might indirectly enhance his public image, the primary goal is not to influence votes in a parliamentary election. The post does not explicitly encourage or discourage voting for any candidate.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post can be considered a form of citizen journalism, reporting on local political activities. It presents information about specific projects and decisions within the County Council, similar to a news report.  The tone is informative and factual, not persuasive or manipulative.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. While the post expresses Ovidiu Bistrian's opinions on the merits of the projects, it does not present them as personal opinions unrelated to his role as a councilor. His support for these projects is directly linked to his official duties.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1137561861306252</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post does not constitute electoral propaganda under Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.  The post focuses on Ovidiu Bistrian's actions as a County Councilor, advocating for local projects. It does not promote or discourage voting for any candidate in a parliamentary election. The content is primarily informative, similar to a news report on local government activities.  The paid nature of the post does not automatically classify it as electoral propaganda; the content itself must meet the criteria for such classification.  In this case, it does not.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Ovidiu Bistrian - Consilier Județean</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
